content.text:
[@happy](@RJ09Kfs3neEZPrbpbWVDxkN92x9moe3aPusOMOc4S2I=.ed25519) 

It's going alright over here. My internet is out, so all I've got is Scuttlebutt, and I'm not feeling great today so I'm working from home. I'm feeling very excited about going to NZ for scuttle-fest, and a little bit bad about how awful I've been at keeping up on my ssb-chess games. Also, a bit hungry, but I'll probably wait until noon to eat. All in all: it's going alright over here.

How the hell are you?
